abstract: Bill Pennington On Pro Football column remarks on Carolina Panthers coach Ron Rivera's unconventionally loose approach to directing players, which seems to have strengthened team; notes Super Bowl week curfew is self-regulated and quarterback Cam Newton is allowed to make his own play calls.
lead_paragraph: A self-regulated curfew is entirely fitting with the ethos of the team, which appears to have old-style leaders but takes an unconventional approach to most things, including play-calling.

headline.main: To Strengthen the Carolina Panthers, Coach Ron Rivera Loosens His Grip
headline.print_headline: To Strengthen the Panthers, Their Coach Loosens His Grip
